title: Does the Nigerian Girls' Science Fair project transform one litre of urine into six hours of electricity?
subtitle: A urine-based generator built by a team of high school girls in Macre-Viri Africa in 2012 is very good, but technology is not as the game changed as many photos suggested online.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: A team of four Nigerian girls has established a generator that produces six hours of electricity using only one litre of urine as fuel.
